mpsProjectPath.description: Path (relative to cwd) of the MPS project to inspect.

sortModules.description: Whether to sort the module entries in .mps/modules.xml, for easier diffing and such.

usageAnalysisPath.description: Path (relatieve to cwd) where to write a usage analysis: a simple CSV which details which concepts (with FQName) and concepts' features (with FQName of concept # feature name) are used in the projects, and how many times. The presence of this field triggers the analysis.

languageVersionsConfiguration.title: Base for triggering some language version analysis.

reportPath.description: Path (relative to cwd) to write the language versions report to.

checkMinus1sInModels.description: Whether to warn (on the console) about models using -1 language versions (see https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/MPS-29937).

generateFromStructure.title: Triggers generation from a specified language's structure.

structureModelPath.description: Path (relative to mpsProjectPath) of structure model XML file to generate from.

generationPath.description: Path (relative to cwd) to generate to.
